item.title: In Support of the Rising Generation
item.description:
In Support of the Rising Generation by Brother Michael T. Nelson, Second Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency given in Saturday Afternoon of 194th Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 2024
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Brother Michael T. Nelson, Second Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency
